segments.text: How were you getting along with your studies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite well . I made good records in college . I won the scholarship in every semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In addition to your major , did you have other fields to study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I had taken finance courses in a training school . Compound talents are needed in the society and I must study continually to keep abreast with the times .
segments.speaker: S2
